titleStmt.title: The case of the merchants concerned in the loss of the ship Virgin, (taken in May 1673. by the Spaniards in the West-Indies) as it was briefly stated and presented to his Majesty / by Sir Richard Lloyd,and Sir Thomas Exton, ; being authorized so to do by his Majesties Order in Councel of the 24th. of July 1677.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Richard, Sir, 1634-1686.
Exton, Thomas, Sir, 1631-1688.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Rich. Lloyd. Tho. Exton.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
